form.label: Feedback Center
form.description: Welcome to the Splunk Enterprise Security Content Updates feedback center.

html.p5:
You can contact the Splunk Threat Research team atresearch@splunk.com to send us support requests, bug reports, and questions.
Specify the request type and the title of any related analytic stories, detections analytics where applicable. You can also find us on the #es-content-updates Splunk Community Slack channel.
